member.name: E:ActiproSoftware.Wizard.Wizard.BackButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the Back button is clicked.
member.eventdata: The event handler receives an argument of type WizardPageCancelEventArgs containing data related to this event. The Cancel property in the WizardPageCancelEventArgs class provides information specific to this event.
member.remarks:
By default, the will move to the previous in the after this event fires. To cancel this behavior, set the Cancel property of the event argument to true. Then you can use the property to set the that should be displayed.
If the selected page has an event handler for this event, this particular event will not be raised since it will be assumed that the associated page's event handler executed the appropriate code.

member.name: E:ActiproSoftware.Wizard.Wizard.CancelButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the Cancel button is clicked.
member.eventdata: The event handler receives an argument of type EventArgs containing data related to this event.
member.remarks:
Handlers of this event generally abort any currently-executing processing tasks and close the Form containing the control.
If the selected page has an event handler for this event, this particular event will not be raised since it will be assumed that the associated page's event handler executed the appropriate code.

member.name: E:ActiproSoftware.Wizard.Wizard.FinishButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the Finish button is clicked.
member.eventdata: The event handler receives an argument of type EventArgs containing data related to this event.
member.remarks:
Handlers of this event generally finish processing any remaining wizard tasks.
If the selected page has an event handler for this event, this particular event will not be raised since it will be assumed that the associated page's event handler executed the appropriate code.

member.name: E:ActiproSoftware.Wizard.Wizard.HelpButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the Help button is clicked.
member.eventdata: The event handler receives an argument of type EventArgs containing data related to this event.
member.remarks:
Handlers of this event generally display help for the currently displayed wizard step.
If the selected page has an event handler for this event, this particular event will not be raised since it will be assumed that the associated page's event handler executed the appropriate code.
